title: SCORCH Literature Review Extraction Schema
description: Schema for extracting climate-health research data from literature focused on arid/semi-arid regions of the US Southwest and northern Mexico

instructions.na_policy: Use the string 'N/A' when information is not present in the source PDF. Do not make assumptions or provide creative answers. Only extract what is explicitly stated or clearly supported by the document.
instructions.boolean_fields: Use true/false for all yes/no and checkbox-style questions.
instructions.array_fields: Use arrays for multiple values. Empty array [] if none found, or ['N/A'] if the question requires acknowledgment that data was sought but not found.

focuses_on_arid_semiarid_sw_us_mexico.description: Q1: Does this study focus on arid and semi-arid regions of the southwestern United States and/or northern Mexico? If not, does it include climate resilience recommendations for arid or semi-arid regions?

includes_primary_data_for_region.description: Q2: Does it include primary data specific to these arid and semi-arid regions?

citation_apa7.description: Q4: Full citation in APA 7th edition format

spatial_scale.description: Q5: Smallest spatial unit used in the study

geographic_areas.description: Q6: Complete list of geographic area(s) assessed

data_date_earliest.description: Q8: Date of earliest data used (mm/dd/YYYY), 'forecast period: START-END', or 'N/A'

data_date_latest.description: Q9: Date of latest data used (mm/dd/YYYY), 'forecast period: START-END', or 'N/A'

setting.description: Q10: Settings analyzed in this study

setting_other.description: Q10: If setting is 'Other', specify here. Otherwise 'N/A'

arid_semiarid_classification.description: Q11: Do the regions carry an arid/semi-arid region classification?

study_design_other.description: Q12: If study_design is 'Other', specify here. Otherwise 'N/A'

data_tables.description: Variable tables (Q13-15). Use empty array [] if no relevant data. Tables can be generated from these arrays.

health_outcome_variables.description: Q13: Health outcome variables analyzed (not just mentioned). Max 10 most relevant. Empty array if health outcomes not included.

variable.description: Name of the health outcome variable

cofactor_variables.description: Q14: Co-factors explicitly included in analysis (exclude weather/climate factors). Max 10 most relevant. Empty array if no co-factors mentioned.

climate_weather_variables.description: Q15: Climate and weather data analyzed. Max 10 most relevant. Empty array if no climate/weather data analyzed.

analytical_methods.description: Q16: Primary analytical methods employed (e.g., 'Poisson regression', 'Time-series model', 'Climate projection using CMIP6')

specific_health_outcomes.description: Q17: Specific climate or climate-related health outcomes/diseases/conditions assessed

health_outcome_categories.description: Q18: Categories of climate-related health outcomes studied. Set to true if studied, false if not.

health_outcome_categories_other_specifie.description: Q18: If 'other' is true, list the additional health outcomes here

direct_exposures.description: Q19: Specific direct exposure(s) assessed in epidemiological terms

exposure_categories.description: Q20: Exposures of interest analyzed or discussed. Set to true if included, false if not.

exposure_categories_other_specified.description: Q20: If 'other' is true, list the additional exposures here

population_sample_size.description: Q21: Population or sample sizes reported. Include ranges/estimates as noted in the paper. Use 'N/A' if not reported.

sex_demographics_reported.description: Q22: Does the study identify sex demographics?

sex_demographics.description: Q22: Sex demographics. Use null for unreported values.

race_ethnicity_reported.description: Q22: Does the study identify race/ethnicity demographics?

race_ethnicity_demographics.description: Q22: Race/Ethnicity demographics. Empty array if not reported.

analyzes_interventions.description: Q23: Does the study analyze any interventions?

intervention_description.description: Q23: Brief description of interventions (1-2 sentences). Use 'N/A' if no interventions analyzed.

objectives_met.description: Q24: Study objectives alignment. Use 'Met', 'Partially Met', or 'Not Met'.

obj_01_climate_health_impacts_arid.description: Explores climate-related human health impacts in arid and semi-arid regions of the SW US and northern Mexico

obj_02_extreme_weather_health.description: Explores direct or indirect health impacts associated with extreme weather events and temperature/precipitation fluctuations

obj_03_climate_health_forecasts.description: Distills climate and climate-related health forecasts for the next 50-100 years

obj_06_solutions_adaptations.description: Explores potential solutions and adaptations for sustainable climate resilience

research_questions.description: Research questions addressed (Q25-28). Use true/false for whether each question is addressed.

q1_extreme_weather_health_impacts.description: Q1: How do extreme weather events and escalating seasonal fluctuations impact human health in arid regions of the SW US and northern Mexico?

addressed.description: Q25: Is this research question addressed? true/false

summary.description: Q26: Summary of their answer in 2-3 sentences. Use 'N/A' if not addressed.

q2_future_disease_landscape.description: Q2: How is the landscape of climate-related diseases likely to change in the SW US and northern Mexico in the next 5, 10, 20, 50, and 100 years?

addressed.description: Q25: Is this research question addressed? true/false

summary.description: Q27: Summary of their answer in 2-3 sentences. Use 'N/A' if not addressed.

q3_sustainable_solutions.description: Q3: What are some examples of successful, sustainable solutions for climate resilience that could apply to the SW states and northern Mexico?

addressed.description: Q25: Is this research question addressed? true/false

summary.description: Q28: Summary of their answer in 2-3 sentences. Use 'N/A' if not addressed.

unquantified_health_impacts.description: Q29: Health impacts mentioned but not quantified (epidemiological terms). Empty array if none.

effect_sizes_reported.description: Q30: Did authors include association or relative impact information?

effect_narrative.description: Q30: Effect size + CI if reported (e.g., 'RR = 1.23, 95% CI: 1.10-1.37'), or qualitative narrative summary (1-3 sentences). Use 'N/A' if not reported.

correlations_table.description: Q31: Correlations studied or mentioned. Max 10 most relevant. Empty array if none reported.

includes_projection_modeling.description: Q32: Does this paper include Climate Change Projection Modeling?

climate_scenarios.description: Q33: Climate scenarios included (e.g., 'RCP 4.5', 'SSP2-4.5'). Empty array if not applicable.

time_horizons.description: Q34: Time horizons mentioned in the study. Use 'N/A' if not applicable.

projection_description.description: Q35: Concise description of climate projections with specific data and time horizons. Use 'N/A' if not applicable.

vulnerable_populations.description: Q36: Vulnerable populations explored. Max 6 most relevant. Empty array if none explored.

population_group.description: Name of the vulnerable population group

resilience_categories.description: Q37: Climate resilience measures discussed. Set to true if explicitly included, false if not.

resilience_categories_other_specified.description: Q37: If 'other' is true, list the additional categories here

specific_strategies.description: Q38: Specific climate resilience strategies mentioned. Empty array if none.

successful_adaptations.description: Q39: Examples of successful adaptations/solutions (few sentences). Use 'N/A' if not provided.

relevance_summary.description: Q40: Summary of why this study is relevant to arid regions of SW US and northern Mexico (2-3 sentences)

limitations.description: Q41: Summary of limitations discussed (2-3 sentences). Use 'N/A' if not discussed.

data_gaps.description: Q42: Summary of data gaps mentioned (2-3 sentences). Use 'N/A' if not mentioned.

future_research.description: Q43: Summary of potential areas for future research (2-3 sentences). Use 'N/A' if not discussed.

relevance_justification.description: Justification with specific reference to objectives (2-3 sentences)

paper_summary.description: Q45: Summary using precise data, statistics, population/health data, and time horizons (2-3 sentences)

conclusions_summary.description: Q46: Concise summary of the conclusions

extractor_agent.description: Name/identifier of the agent that performed extraction

notes.description: Any additional notes about the extraction. Use 'N/A' if none.
